title: Introducing: Halos
body:
This is pretty funky.

London outfit (I’m guessing trio…) **Halos** seem to have risen from the ashes of another act, although I can’t for the life of me work out who. Not quite as radio ready as Clean Bandit, nor as over the top as Jungle, yet embodying elements of both, it’s brilliantly ambitious, and one of my favourite debut tracks of the year. Check out _Dust_ below.

Props to [Laurie](www.skeletory.com/tune-halos-dust/) & Dan Market
